verses.verse: A Psalm of David <WH1732>. Bless <WH1288> the LORD <WH3068>, O my soul <WH5315>: and all that is within <WH7130> me, bless his holy <WH6944> name <WH8034>.
Bless <WH1288> the LORD <WH3068>, O my soul <WH5315>, and forget <WH7911> not all his benefits <WH1576>:
Who forgiveth <WH5545> all thine iniquities <WH5771>; who healeth <WH7495> all thy diseases <WH8463>;
Who redeemeth <WH1350> thy life <WH2416> from destruction <WH7845>; who crowneth <WH5849> thee with lovingkindness <WH2617> and tender mercies <WH7356>;
Who satisfieth <WH7646> thy mouth <WH5716> with good <WH2896> things; so that thy youth <WH5271> is renewed <WH2318> like the eagle's <WH5404>.
The LORD <WH3068> executeth <WH6213> righteousness <WH6666> and judgment <WH4941> for all that are oppressed <WH6231>.
He made known <WH3045> his ways <WH1870> unto Moses <WH4872>, his acts <WH5949> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.
The LORD <WH3068> is merciful <WH7349> and gracious <WH2587>, slow <WH750> to anger <WH639>, and plenteous <WH7227> in mercy <WH2617>. plentious: Heb. great in mercy
He will not always <WH5331> chide <WH7378>: neither will he keep <WH5201> his anger for ever <WH5769>.
He hath not dealt <WH6213> with us after our sins <WH2399>; nor rewarded <WH1580> us according to our iniquities <WH5771>.
For as the heaven <WH8064> is high above <WH1361> the earth <WH776>, so great <WH1396> is his mercy <WH2617> toward them that fear <WH3373> him. as: Heb. according to the height of the heaven
As far as <WH7368> the east <WH4217> is from the west <WH4628>, so far hath he removed <WH7368> our transgressions <WH6588> from us.
Like as a father <WH1> pitieth <WH7355> his children <WH1121>, so the LORD <WH3068> pitieth <WH7355> them that fear <WH3373> him.
For he knoweth <WH3045> our frame <WH3336>; he remembereth <WH2142> that we are dust <WH6083>.
As for man <WH582>, his days <WH3117> are as grass <WH2682>: as a flower <WH6731> of the field <WH7704>, so he flourisheth <WH6692>.
For the wind <WH7307> passeth over <WH5674> it, and it is gone; and the place <WH4725> thereof shall know <WH5234> it no more. it is: Heb. it is not

But the mercy <WH2617> of the LORD <WH3068> is from everlasting <WH5769> to <WH5704> everlasting <WH5769> upon them that fear <WH3373> him, and his righteousness <WH6666> unto children's <WH1121> children <WH1121>;
To such as keep <WH8104> his covenant <WH1285>, and to those that remember <WH2142> his commandments <WH6490> to do <WH6213> them.
The LORD <WH3068> hath prepared <WH3559> his throne <WH3678> in the heavens <WH8064>; and his kingdom <WH4438> ruleth <WH4910> over all.

Bless <WH1288> the LORD <WH3068>, ye his angels <WH4397>, that excel <WH1368> in strength <WH3581>, that do <WH6213> his commandments <WH1697>, hearkening <WH8085> unto the voice <WH6963> of his word <WH1697>. that excel: Heb. mighty in strength
Bless <WH1288> ye the LORD <WH3068>, all ye his hosts <WH6635>; ye ministers <WH8334> of his, that do <WH6213> his pleasure <WH7522>.
Bless <WH1288> the LORD <WH3068>, all his works <WH4639> in all places <WH4725> of his dominion <WH4475>: bless <WH1288> the LORD <WH3068>, O my soul <WH5315>.
